channel.title: themes on TCC
channel.description: Recent content in themes on TCC

item.title: HTML and CSS only tabs
item.description: Basic shortcodes The following content: {{< tabgroup >}} {{< tab name="Hello" >}} Hello World! {{< /tab >}} {{< tab name="Goodbye" >}} Goodbye Everybody! {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabgroup >}} Will generate: Hello Hello World! Goodbye Goodbye Everybody! Right alighment You can also align the tabs to the right: {{< tabgroup align="right" >}} {{< tab name="Hello" >}} Hello World! {{< /tab >}} {{< tab name="Goodbye" >}} Goodbye Everybody! {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabgroup >}} Giving you this look:
